name: Parallel Universe mazes
description:
You are standing in a room and wish to reach a goal in a different room. The same is the case for your alter ego in a parallel universe. Can you  satisfy both your ego and your alter ego at the same time?

  • Number of puzzles: 30
  • Average play time: 1h
  • First published: Sept 2003 (original five mazes only)
  • Original: http://www.clickmazes.com/osk2pu/new-osk2pu.htm
  • Keyboard controls: arrow keys or WASD to move; [Z] to undo; [R] for restart.
  • Touchscreen controls: tap at the main menu; swipe to move; open the tab menu in the upper left to undo moves and restart.

Explore more of Erich's puzzles at: Puzzle Palace   
See also: The Erich Friedman puzzle collection - by pedroPSI

puzzle concept  - Oskar van Deventer - 2003
puzzlescript implementation - Matthieu Haller - 2021  
puzzle designs - Oskar van Deventer & Erich Friedman - 2003/2021
